name: Slimes Around
description:
You're a slime. there are slimes with different colors around you. your job is to jump around, squash other slimes to make them your friend. but be careful, they can also make you their friend.

This game was made within less than 2 days, and is the very first game that i've ever finished. so, I'm sorry for anything inconvenient about this game.

hope you enjoy :) I'm open to any feedback, so don't forget to leave yours in the comment section below.

CONTROL:

Left Click - Jump Around 

Escape - Pause Game

Credits:

coding, art, music, sfx : Amob
